description: Allows the mob to look at the player they are trading with.

angle_of_view_horizontal.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see rotated on the Y-axis (left-right).

angle_of_view_vertical.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see rotated on the X-axis (up-down).

look_distance.description: The distance in blocks from which the entity will look at the nearest entity.

look_time.description: Time range to look at the nearest entity.

probability.description: The probability of looking at the target. A value of 1.00 is 100%.

title: minecraft:behavior.look_at_trading_player
